name: Diploma in Civil Engineering
description: Focuses on construction, design, and maintenance of the physical and naturally built environment.

name: Diploma in Mechanical Engineering
description: Covers the design, analysis, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems.

name: Diploma in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
description: Deals with the study and application of electricity, electronics, and electromagnetism.

name: Diploma in Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: Focuses on electronic circuits, communication systems, and signal processing.

name: Diploma in Computer Engineering
description: Integrates computer science and electrical engineering to develop computer hardware and software.
